availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Malinda Russell Cassity Hedges (Rowan County, Kentucky, housewife.)

body.p: Rowan County, Kentucky, housewife. Montgomery County, Kentucky native. Daughter of Peter Cassity and Mary Ann Armstrong. Married to William Ribelin Hedges in Rowan County, Kentucky on December 2, 1822. Mother of Mary Ann Hedges Crouch, Addison Wesley Hedges, Viana Jane Hedges, Peter Thompson Hedges, Levi Marion Hedges, Rosannah Sarah Hedges Gilkison, Melissa Lucinda Hedges Generee, William Ribelin Hedges Jr., James Alva Hedges, and Isaac Armstrong Hedges. Resident in Fleming County in 1850. Housewife in Rowan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #2711.
